features.title: Burst-link multi-runner
features.description: Queue Python and Node executions through a shared warm pool so chained runs feel instantaneous.
features.impact: Cuts polyglot feedback loops below five seconds for most scripts.
blueprint: Add a runner toggle that pre-warms the next language container when the current run is >50% complete.
Stream per-language stdout/stderr with timestamps so latency regressions are obvious.
Persist merged logs plus timing metadata to `workspaces/<user>/logs/burst-link.json`.

features.title: Latency map console
features.description: Expose a live console that visualises queue, start, and teardown timings for every sandbox run.
features.impact: Gives Echo instant awareness of runner pressure before launching the next upgrade.
blueprint: Instrument the Node server with structured telemetry events emitted over WebSocket.
Aggregate the events in the client and render sparkline charts beside the terminal.
Add alert thresholds so spikes over 2Ã— baseline get highlighted with recovery tips.

features.title: Luminary overlay deck
features.description: Ship the narrative overlay cards that keep palette, soundtrack, and intent visible mid-run.
features.impact: Aligns creative direction with engineering execution during every sandbox session.
blueprint: Expose a `/signals/luminary` endpoint returning the active overlay payload.
Render collapsible cards beside the editor with keyboard shortcuts for focus mode.
Allow saving overlay revisions with each workspace checkpoint for later playback.

features.title: Atlas skyway prompts
features.description: Map Echo Computer scenes to Echo Atlas beats via contextual prompt panels.
features.impact: Keeps writers, artists, and engineers synced on the same storyline arcs.
blueprint: Ingest atlas metadata + pulse notes to build per-project context capsules.
Design a dockable split-panel that can anchor on either side of the editor.
Experiment with emoji-rich markdown syntax for mood and intent annotations.

features.title: Reviewer ground-station
features.description: Surface who last touched each workspace file and auto-suggest handoff partners.
features.impact: Reduces async coordination time by highlighting ready reviewers plus runbooks.
blueprint: Ingest the latest git commits for every workspace file and cache author metadata.
Display avatars + reviewer suggestions beside the file tree with copy-to-clipboard run commands.
Offer a `/handoff/ground-station` JSON feed for downstream notifications.

features.title: Collaboration field console
features.description: Bundle reviewer radar, telemetry snippets, and TODO prompts into a single shareable console view.
features.impact: Lets every operator publish a ready-to-run upgrade packet directly from Echo Computer.
blueprint: Add a `/handoff/kits` endpoint that aggregates commits, test runs, and outstanding questions.
Render a collapsible console with copy-to-clipboard runbooks and reviewer tags.
Expose a webhook-friendly JSON payload for async channel broadcasts.
